# Camera Calibration
Tested under

```
2021/2/2
OpenCV 3.4.13 (should work with any 3.x)
Visual Studio 2017 (VS 15)
```

```
2019/5/22
OpenCV 3.2 (should work with 3.x)
Visual Studio 2015
```
